title: Ok, Riot at its best right here.
body:
?????????????????????????????????????????????????

So, run down. 

Fizz went mid to sit at tower, vel and quin went to sit at bot tower. Im sitting at my red, get invaded by all 5 enemies. Ok.

 I knew red was gone so I went to check chickens, morg and kayne still there.. died a second time. At this point, vel walked up to them and let them kill him. I went to my blue, guess what.. kayne ghost walks over the wall, smites my blue and kills me. Velkoz follows, lets them kill him. 

At this point hes flaming and saying its pointless to play if the jungler is inting, and he buys a longsword. When I came back to life, I went to get gromp. Kayn is still sitting at my blue waiting, he kills me with the help of mundo who was sitting top tri from blue side. At this point kayn is like 8/0 and finding me everywhere in my jungle killing me, I attempted to gank top, died to mundo. I attempted to gank bot once I got ult, died to kayn counter gank. Now im like 0/8, still trying to farm what I can that kayn is not taking, and velkoz continues building AD and running up to enemies letting them kill him. 

He starts spamming ff vote at 15, still building AD, still intentionally feeding. I managed to get 1 kill in a team fight at the base, while he ran in dying over and over. I did NOT intentionally feed, I was trying to build armor and this velkoz reports me for inting cause hes a salty prick and I get banned for 2 weeks?

I demand a retrial or a re-evaluation wtf is this.

<Removed by Moderation>

replies.body:
Dying a lot is not against the rules.

Inting is against the rules.
---------------
At 0:33 you ward and see 4 of them. You evade the Morg binding, but your "escape" path is odd, you know, not towards the closest safe area or not towards a wall to flash over, and you turn around to auto...twice.

That's really really ugly, but it's possible to make really bad decisions. Maybe not inting.
-------------------
At 1:01, your botlane has just been chased out of your jungle by 4 enemies. You charge the Morg, who binds you. When that times out...you walk forward into the rest of them. Who you knew were there. Who you knew were preparing to take your red. You had no flash. Your only skill, Audacious Charge still on CD. You were just half-healthed by the Morgana, and walking forward into the enemies that you knew were there was your choice.

That's inting. You did that on purpose. You had ample time to choose anything else.
-----------------------
....You chose to go right back to the red...where you knew they were. Your tri-brush was warded, so you knew that their botlane hadn't left your jungle yet. You take the blast-cone over the wall. You see that the red isn't in the camp, and you finally see the enemy botlane going back to lane. You walk into the brush instead of walking away.

Inting.
-------------------
2:54 after taking your wolves, you see Kayne in the midlane. You go to your blue. 2:58 Kayne is visible leaving mid, going to your blue side jungle. You don't drag the blue into the brush, but instead do a standing trade out in the open. 3:04 Kayne walks through the wall, right in front of you. You run away till 3:09, when suddenly, at half health already, you turn around to auto attack. The Vel-Koz, who is far away, is still level 1, and only has Plasma Fission. Even if they weren't inting, they would be completely unable to assist you. 3:12 you did smite for health. Good work. But you're still taking a standing trade with someone a level above you. You could have maybe walked away, but you Audacious Charged back into him, again. 

~~Inting~~ (edit: Explained enough. Not inting)
-----------------------------
3:48 you were spotted by the vision plant. That means that Kayne is still in your jungle and that he sees you. You...continue forward. 3:53 you engage the Gromp. 3:54 Mundo, in vision, walks under the turret to your jungle. 3:58 Kayne appears. You die.

Inting
---------------------------------
6:14 Kayne in vision near your raptors. You finish killing the wolves. 6:20 Kayne in vision near raptors again. You decide to go to your raptors...6:24 Kayne almost kills Rengar, and the Rengar flashes away. 6:26 Fizz 205 health, recalling. Rengar 215 health still running. You walking towards a Kayne two levels above you. You sit there and auto attack till 6:31 where you run away....to not underneath the turrets. Perfectly between both turrets' range, ~~then waste your flash after the burn is sure to kill you.~~ (edit: unfair accusation rescinded)

inting
--------------------------------
7:11 you help chase the Kayne out from turret diving the Rengar who had been unable/unwilling to finish their recall (it seems that he was trolling as well). 7:16 you ward, and Fizz is coming up behind you to help. Enemy Yasuo is seen leaving mid to back up their Kayne. 7:16 Fizz turns back to mid to tend to the minions since Kayne has been chased out of the dive. You keep going. 7:18 you finally catch up to Kayne. 7:21 you die. Yasuo was there too. You knew it. And Kayne would have killed you solo anyway.

~~inting~~ (edit: Understandable set of decisions: Not inting)
--------------------------------
8:31-9:00 you're fighting Ez under your turret. You keep getting poked down, really low, really easily, but Ez takes some turret shots. Seeing an opening, you charge him, but die.

It looked pretty nasty taking all that damage, you could have died at almost any time, and recalling from there would have been a decent decision, but that xp probably looked really good, and the last charge at Ez could have gotten him.

Not inting
------------------------------------
11:00ish Taking minions, killed by the Kayne.

Not inting this time, but very easy for the Kayne because of the prior inting, by you, Rengar, and Vel'Koz.
--------------------------------------
12:30 They've chased out the Fizz from your inhib turret, but their minion wave all died, so the tower is safe for now. You go to flank them. You and Quinn jump in, 2v3 and take one down.

Not inting, but easy for the enemies because of the prior inting.
---------------------------------
15:00ish Getting minions again, killed under turret.

not inting, but easy for the enemies because of the prior inting.
-----------------------------------
16:50 died defending inhib

Not inting, but easy for the enemies because of the prior inting.
--------------------------------
18:00ish solo contesting an already destroyed inhibitor. Running away...not towards safety. Flashing in. But, you were already dead at that point.

Eh, it's hard to call this one. Your retreat path, as well as the decision to try to defend an already lost objective. But, either way, the prior inting decided the outcome of this interaction.
------------------------------
18:45 died defending Nexus

Not inting, but easy for the enemies because of the prior inting.
-----------------------------------
--------------------------------
--------------------------------
So,~~ 6~~ (edit: 4) inting deaths, ~~8~~ (edit: 10) not inting or questionable enough deaths.

Inting gets a 14 day ban for the first offense. It only takes one purposeful death to be called inting. You inted.

Call it what you will but I know I didnt die on purpose. I did not make any decision with the thought "im going to go die on purpose." Call it soft inting or not caring what happens but whatever. I am not a jungler, as you can see from my match history I play only support unless I get auto filled. I don't know the thought process of a "good" jungler or where im even supposed to go. You call it inting, I call it sucking at jungling. I don't think i've had one game where I did well in the jungle, and this was an extreme version of what I already expected getting auto filled. 

I made choices to try to save myself from being behind all game as I already knew I would be with losing most of my jungle the first few minutes of the game and already getting flamed. Judging from what you say, all the enemies being visable before my deaths, I now know that I don't look at my map enough. Whatever, ill take this 2 weeks to learn how to jungle better from videos and streams and.. whatever.

-edit-

Let me explain a few of those deaths you've deemed inting:

1. When I go into the brush at red, I think at that point that its possible for me to steal it with smite to save it and put him behind. Didn't work. Not inting. 

2. When you claim I "saw" kayne mid, I did not. I imagined that after he stole my entire bot jungle he would go to his own jungle and leave me behind with no red or chickens. At this point I have leveled my Q, so when I try to escape, I turn to auto for the knockup, as he has my red so im slowed, and he is a level ahead so he has his E to slow ME from far away. I did not expect velkoz to help as I already knew he was inting after the first stunt he pulled. I was only trying to survive with my Q knockup and the mastery that gives me attack speed when I first auto an enemy. Not inting. 

3. Why would I run anywhere but the furthest away from my enemy? I walk between the towers because walking directly to the t2 tower leaves me much closer to him than running directly in the opposite direction. Not inting, trying to escape and getting outplayed. 

4. I don't recall the moment I chased kayne, but yes that was a bad decision. He must have been low and I thought I could get some XP and shutdown gold in some desperate attempt to catch up. My actions were not because I WANTED to die. not inting. 

so, 2 very questionable deaths. Probably very bad decisions out of frustration, not only from this game starting poorly but from the previous 2 losses as well.

You know, I probably judged too harshly.

1: Going for the smite on the red in that situation is.....How to explain my thoughts: In the 1/3rd of a second prior to entering the brush, the decision to enter the brush has the highest potential reward, and having already lost all that time means that not contesting would be a big loss. So entering the brush wasn't exactly the part of that decision that I consider inting. The inting occurred when you chose to _enter_ your red side jungle after already dying there twice before any jungle camps spawned.

Pathing to that side of your jungle at that point in time looks like an intentional desire to feed the enemy kills. 

2: That explanation is full and complete. A set of poor decisions is not inting. The Audacious Charge at the end, instead of taking those last steps to get under turret still looks bad, but I can see that at that point you felt dead already and were just returning damage with a skill that came off CD. Not inting.

3: Engaging with the Kayne at that time really looks like you're intending to give him an advantage. Both of your nearby teammates were completely unable to assist without great risk of dying. He was much more powerful than you were. You had two turrets available to escape to, but chose to run across between them. I will retract my accusation that you burned flash purposefully.

It doesn't look like you were really trying to escape though. And the part where you chose to give the enemies an advantage was when you chose to engage Kayne in combat. Choosing to give the opponents an advantage is punishable.

4: He was knocked down to half health, and for a half-second you did have Fizz coming to back you up. It would be reasonable to not notice that Fizz changed trajectories, and greeding for a kill is not inting. So, Not inting.
---------------------------
That brings my total to 4:10.

I can live with that.

 At least you understand that not everyone is part of an elite LCS team and we all don't have excellent map awareness or pro jungle strats. I have played Xin a few times... not enough to know my strength at any level or with any amount of items. As I am a Nami main, I am rarely close to enemies unless they jump on me.. all of my knowledge of the game was gained by playing from afar and assisting with heals or a bubble and retreating. An in-your-face character like xin or irelia is cool to me, I like their themes but they are hard to play. 

I stick by what I said about not inting though, I lose enough games as it is without just throwing LP away. I surely wouldn't risk being banned for 14 days or permanently to piss off 1 person... Its cool, though. I play Heroes of the Storm which will hold me over until the 9th.

You know, though... when I ran between t1 and t2 towers to escape kayne, he could easily have dove me and taken 1-2-3 tower shots and still used his ghost walk ability to escape tower range and heal himself. As I said.. I was just trying to get as far away as I could.

You have 14 deaths and he has 16 deaths. 

It could have been that you baited that player into dying and leaving him to the enemy team to lower his KDA.

Since we cannot see your replays, the only thing we can do is guess at what happened.

Open a support ticket if you didn't report that other player. If you did, then just sit back and wait.

If you want to talk about YOUR punishment, we can, but it looks like you want to just blame someone else and get someone else punished and get yours lifted, which the forum cannot do. We do not have that kind of power or authority.

You (as you're from NA) can see his replays. Go into your profile, than search his profile name, go into match history and download and watch the replay. Doesn't work for me since I can't get access to his NA profile with the client.

Ok, I get where you're coming from. I'm upset that the real inter in the game was Velkoz, not me. I'm upset that I was banned for 2 weeks for having a bad game, while he was INTENTIONALLY feeding and is still not banned. It's unjust, and not right. 

Lets go over it step by step since you guys want so many details. 

The game started we're all in the base. Bought our starting items and ran out of the base. Rengar ran to top tower, sat there. Fizz ran to mid tower, sat there. Quinn and velkoz ran to their tower, sat there. 

I'm sitting in red bush bottom blue side, when I get stunned by morgana. Kayn flashed towards me and Q'd, the rest followed up with their damage and I flashed but died to an ignite and mundo cleaver while trying to run back into the base. 

No one put any wards down, no one came to assist in protecting my already compromised jungle. Velkoz and Quinn pinged my dead body with question marks. I respawn, go to check my chickens. Morgana kayn and ezreal are sitting in the brush by chickens. Dark binding, I have no flash, im dead again. While I'm waiting to respawn, velkoz walks up from bot and lets them kill him in the same place. I respawn and walk towards my blue buff, velkoz follows after he respawns. Im doing blue, kayn shadow steps over the wall, smites my blue and kills me because hes like level 4 or 5 now and im still level 2. I'm dead, velkoz walks in and they kill him as well. 

I respawn, walk to gromp. Velkoz follows. I start killing gromp, kayn is sitting in blue brush waiting. I get low, mundo cleavers me, kayn kills me, velkoz walks up to them lets them kill him. Around this time is where he said "no point playing with an inting jg, just open mid." Quinn says some stuff, fizz says some stuff, whatever.

Velkoz goes back to base, buys a longsword.. walks to bot tower straight up to ezreal stands there while ezreal kills him. 

I try to gank bot, mundo TPs, kayn is there to counter, we all die. Velkoz lies in wait at the tower with 1 or 2 bars of hp, stands there to let kayn kill him. We get into another team fight over mid towers, fizz pops off after we all die. Around this time I noticed Velkoz had built a few ad items and berserker greaves, pointed it out to the team and said he was the real inter. 

Velkoz goes top where ezreal is pushing, lets him kill him. I am scurrying to try to get farm anywhere, in lane.. skuttle crabs, wherever I can get some gold. I finish my jungle item, go to gank top where ezreal is still pushing and velkoz and quinn are near. I jump onto ezreal, they both do nothing, ezreal E's back and uses heal, kayn shadow walks through the wall, im dead again. 

After that was bottom lane, I went to hold tower with a few team mates.. died to yasuo. Died to kayn sweeping team fights a few more times after that while we said no to Vel's surrender vote spam and tried to hold our base and contest dragons, baron, or get defensive vision. 

Pretty sure thats exactly how it went, minus a few insignificant skirmishes here and there that kinda worked in our favor but ultimately got us no closer to victory as we were pretty much stuck in our base killing super minions until the game was over.

> [{quoted}](name=SarumanTrolling,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HttAdw9X,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-27T06:19:28.211+0000)
>
> Ok, I get where you're coming from. I'm upset that the real inter in the game was Velkoz, not me. I'm upset that I was banned for 2 weeks for having a bad game, while he was INTENTIONALLY feeding and is still not banned. It's unjust, and not right. 
> 
> Lets go over it step by step since you guys want so many details. 
> 
> The game started we're all in the base. Bought our starting items and ran out of the base. Rengar ran to top tower, sat there. Fizz ran to mid tower, sat there. Quinn and velkoz ran to their tower, sat there. 
> 
> I'm sitting in red bush bottom blue side, when I get stunned by morgana. Kayn flashed towards me and Q'd, the rest followed up with their damage and I flashed but died to an ignite and mundo cleaver while trying to run back into the base. 
> 
> No one put any wards down, no one came to assist in protecting my already compromised jungle. Velkoz and Quinn pinged my dead body with question marks. I respawn, go to check my chickens. Morgana kayn and ezreal are sitting in the brush by chickens. Dark binding, I have no flash, im dead again. While I'm waiting to respawn, velkoz walks up from bot and lets them kill him in the same place. I respawn and walk towards my blue buff, velkoz follows after he respawns. Im doing blue, kayn shadow steps over the wall, smites my blue and kills me because hes like level 4 or 5 now and im still level 2. I'm dead, velkoz walks in and they kill him as well. 
> 
> I respawn, walk to gromp. Velkoz follows. I start killing gromp, kayn is sitting in blue brush waiting. I get low, mundo cleavers me, kayn kills me, velkoz walks up to them lets them kill him. Around this time is where he said "no point playing with an inting jg, just open mid." Quinn says some stuff, fizz says some stuff, whatever.
> 
> Velkoz goes back to base, buys a longsword.. walks to bot tower straight up to ezreal stands there while ezreal kills him. 
> 
> I try to gank bot, mundo TPs, kayn is there to counter, we all die. Velkoz lies in wait at the tower with 1 or 2 bars of hp, stands there to let kayn kill him. We get into another team fight over mid towers, fizz pops off after we all die. Around this time I noticed Velkoz had built a few ad items and berserker greaves, pointed it out to the team and said he was the real inter. 
> 
> Velkoz goes top where ezreal is pushing, lets him kill him. I am scurrying to try to get farm anywhere, in lane.. skuttle crabs, wherever I can get some gold. I finish my jungle item, go to gank top where ezreal is still pushing and velkoz and quinn are near. I jump onto ezreal, they both do nothing, ezreal E's back and uses heal, kayn shadow walks through the wall, im dead again. 
> 
> After that was bottom lane, I went to hold tower with a few team mates.. died to yasuo. Died to kayn sweeping team fights a few more times after that while we said no to Vel's surrender vote spam and tried to hold our base and contest dragons, baron, or get defensive vision. 
> 
> Pretty sure thats exactly how it went, minus a few insignificant skirmishes here and there that kinda worked in our favor but ultimately got us no closer to victory as we were pretty much stuck in our base killing super minions until the game was over.

I watched your replay after reading InTheory's suggestion on going to your profile in client to watch your replay. I can't read anything in team chats, only all chat so I can't verify claims of people saying certain things.

However, your description of the first encounter isn't what I saw. Vel did try to help you and he fired his Q off to slow as many people as he could and he tried to hang around to see if they'd continue the invade and they did and he was trying to run away. Would it have been better if he warded before leaving? Yes. Is it punishable that he didn't, no. He might have been too focused on escaping alive or he just figured you would start on the other side of the map instead of going back to red when you could see that they were still there. 

If anything it could be feasible that you were inting early game because you kept engaging on higher level enemy champions who had invaded your jungle and were just making a point that your allies don't help you in your jungle when you're behind... but I really don't have any time to review your other jungle games to see if this is normal behavior or if you're inting.

I don't really see inting except two questionable deaths. 1) Rift Herald Solo, 2) mid solo farming and ezreal just comes behind him and eats him.

{{champion:267}} Hey there,

I deleted the picture you had in your thread as it stated the name of the summoner you are talking about in this thread. Boards does not allow for the naming and shaming of any individuals. Please take the time to read and familiarize yourself with the Universal Rules :)

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

That is SO helpful to the topic at hand, thanks for such enlightening information.

How about instead of showing up to protect the real rule breaker, you say something about me being wrongfully banned while he is still playing and wreaking havoc in other people's games?

This thread is not about him, it's about me being banned for something I did not do. It just so happens that the EXACT game I was banned for featured an ACTUAL offender of the rule I was banned for and he did not get banned.

> [{quoted}](name=SarumanTrolling,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HttAdw9X,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-07-27T09:41:27.461+0000)
>
> That is SO helpful to the topic at hand, thanks for such enlightening information.
> 
> How about instead of showing up to protect the real rule breaker, you say something about me being wrongfully banned while he is still playing and wreaking havoc in other people's games?

{{champion:267}} Hi, Im a volunteer moderator.

I don't work at Riot games, have nothing to do with their in game behaviour systems or anything like that. I am here to enforce the Universal Rules of this board. I informed you as to an action I took on your thread, that's all.

Good luck.

> Reporting Other Players
> 
> Please don't report a potentially misbehaving player in these boards. If you see or hear about another person breaking the rules, send us a ticket directly so we can investigate and take action if necessary. We know that players report publicly with the best intentions, but it often leads to a witchhunt, rarely resulting in a positive discussion. We’ll be taking action against players who have violated rules, so please report these players correctly.
> 
> Moderators will be looking for the following:
> 
> Posts that accuse others of being toxic players in-game
> Posts accusing others of malicious activity
> Posts that accuse others of cheating or using illegal services
> Posts accusing others of trolling in the boards (there’s a report button for that)
> 

First of all, I love all these words like "potentially" and "if necessary". My picture wasn't an accusation, it was proof. The guy had 16 deaths in 17 minutes, he built AD items on a support velkoz, and if anyone dug deeper into the match history or the replay they'd see his blatant violation of the rules. Pull up the chat from the game, you will see his toxic chat both in-game and in the post game lobby. 

There's no witch hunt here and the discussion is not "negative". There was no reason to remove the picture other than to protect the toxic player.

Since Riots system for punishing rule breakers is obviously flawed, its only right that we should be allowed to share more proof here than their little automated system can identify, no? 

Riot is notorious for this kind of stuff, i'm not saying anything new.

> Pull up the chat from the game, you will see his toxic chat both in-game and in the post game lobby.

He literally just said he doesn't work for riot. How's he meant to see your part game chat?

I'm just saying the proof is there. I did not just make empty accusations, the proof is all there for anyone who can see it. I provided proof that can be seen by anyone, and riot employees can access even more proof. He/She removed clear and unaltered proof that the velkoz was inting. 

 Go play on Reddit or something.

The Velkoz also continued flaming me for the duration of the match, even asking to make bets that I was going to troll and press no on the surrender vote that he began spamming at 15 minutes. 3 people pressed no, the other pressing yes was probably his friend or someone who was sickened by how the game had started and wanted out. At the end, in the post game lobby, he begged people to report me and said that my mother definitely should have aborted me.

what type of ban is this?

If this is about your ban, then discuss your behaviors and your chats.

If this is about velkoz, then he can make the thread himself.  There's no point for you to make a thread for him.

What are you talking about?

I got banned for 2 weeks for "intentionally feeding". The REAL inter in this game was the Velkoz, which is clear by his deaths, where he died as you can see from checking the match recap, and his obvious inter's build of ad items. 

He inted, he flamed me in-game and post game, and he did not get banned. I had a horrible game, made worse by being hunted by Kayn all game AND being ignored and flamed by my team mates and I was banned for 2 weeks. Not even a warning for dying a lot or anything. This is my first ban AND ive had WORSE games with MORE deaths that I did not get banned for so it is a mistake. I would not int, maybe talk trash but inting is the worst. I see that my name draws more attention to me than it should but it is just a summoner name not any indication that I am a troll or I will int in games. I have seen horrible names, "Bot or I AFK" "Yas or Feed" stuff like that how is my name worse than those? lol it boggles the mind.

but this is about YOU and your ban.  whether the velkoz really did int and being toxic or not have no bearing on your punishment.  You continued to laser focus on the velkoz muddied any meaningful discussion in this thread because again, no one else in that game has any impact on your punishment whatsoever.  9 people could had inted or 0 people inted that game have zero influencement on your ban.  It's pointless to tell us what he did that game.  Focus the discussion on yourself only.

Death (or feeding) is not the sole reason behind the ban.  It is called INTENTIONALLY feeding.  You can have 30 unintended deaths in a game by being grossly outplayed and camped and you would not be banned.  If you have just a few INTENDED deaths to screw over your teammates, that would get you banned.

Intentionally feeding, if detected, is a minumum 14 days ban the detection gives a lot of leeway to avoid false positive and it's pretty hard to trip that thing.  I am unable to pull your match history from where I am right now, but when I am able, I'll try to give a more detailed reply.

Ok, I died.. a lot. I died when trying to gank, I died when trying to farm my jungle, I died when trying to steal baron/dragons. I died when holding towers, dove by a fed kayn and impossible to stop mundo. I died when trying to gank mid. I died. I got banned for DYING. I did not run it down mid, I did not walk up to enemies and say "hey im mad that you invaded my jungle so here kill me freely!" I did not say I was going to int or say anything in chat that alludes to a desire to intentionally feed. I said one line early, something like "Im muting you all, hope you guys enjoy the game." Later on pointed out Velkozs build and stated that he was the real inter.
Did you send a support ticket? Did you talk to Riot? Talking about Vel on the board ain't gonna do shit for anyone. It isn't going to punish Vel or get you unbanned.

{{champion:267}} Hi, as mentioned, we do not allow the naming of individuals in order to shame them. I have deleted the information you posted in your thread regarding this. 

Please make sure to read the Universal Rules regarding this matter. Any more violations and I will have to take down the thread as you have been warned twice now.

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

Take it down lol you're a volunteer, some power hungry wannabe mod. Please do me a favor and take it down. You will go to great lengths to protect someone clearly breaking the rules, but have no input otherwise. People like you... lol
>I'm breaking the rules and going nowhere and you're doing something as basic as issuing warnings. CLEARLY you're power hungry!

Yea, who volunteers to  protect rule breakers from being outted? Its like being a known criminal's crooked lawyer... but hey, if she gets her jollies by scouring the boards for pictures of rule breakers to delete thats cool I guess. Apparently you get yours by putting something sarcastic and completely made up in a quote box. Everyone has their thing. Enjoy lol.

>Its like being a known criminal's crooked lawyer

She hasn't shown any corruption and she ain't defending you so...

The corruption is on Riots end, having rules in place to protect people who break their.. other.. rules? 

She doens't need to defend me as I have done nothing wrong, as stated in multiple comments here.
Can you provide a screenshot of your "report card"?

The thing that it shows when I log in to play? It just says intentionally feeding. 

http://prntscr.com/kbmtry

I had JUST reached my first checkpoint for honor rewards, too... this is such bullshit. 

That "Game 1" is the match history of the image linked in the OP

Wow, thats unusual getting banned for intentionally feeding? Now if riot could to that to people who deserve it. I've had people admit in chat to intentionally throwing the game and no punishment was issued.


Ok, can you upload a replay of the game somewhere? That way we can see if you were intentionally dieing or just having a bad game.
Someone else did a detailed analysis of each of my deaths in the game, just look up a little bit. I don't agree, but hes entitled to his opinion same as everyone.
Yes,but it was not a great analysis.

Its pretty spot on except that its not totally objective. Riot's not gonna reverse it because i'm sure reasonable doubt doesn't count here. The facts of:

1. it's my first ever ban for anything
2. I was working on level 2 honor and had just made progress before my punishment
